subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Cornerback Darrelle Revis showed mixed emotions about his trade to Tampa Bay. He expressed joy about joining the Bucs but remained perplexed about his departure from the Jets.
snippet: Cornerback Darrelle Revis showed mixed emotions about his trade to Tampa Bay. He expressed joy about joining the Bucs but remained perplexed about his departure from the Jets.
